articles.description: Rodri's late goal denies Chelsea victory and maintains Manchester City's long unbeaten home record in the Premier League.
articles.title: Rodri rescues point for Man City against Chelsea

articles.description: Mohamed Salah scores his first goal for Liverpool since 1 January as they open up a five-point lead at the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Salah scores on return as Liverpool beat Brentford

articles.description: Bukayo Saka scores twice as Arsenal thrash Burnley to close the gap at the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Saka scores twice as ruthless Arsenal thrash Burnley

articles.description: Former South Africa all-rounder Mike Procter dies aged 77, his family say.
articles.title: South Africa cricket great Procter dies aged 77

articles.description: England are fabulously entertaining, but must learn to adapt if they want to become a great team, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: 'England must not become a blunt instrument'

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen move eight points clear of Bayern Munich at the top of the Bundesliga after a narrow victory over mid-table Heidenheim.
articles.title: Leverkusen move eights points clear in Bundesliga

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers admits Celtic's performances are not good enough, but what has gone wrong in the manager's second spell?
articles.title: What has gone wrong for Celtic under Rodgers?

articles.description: Barcelona return to winning ways by nicking a late victory at Celta Vigo through Robert Lewandowski's retaken 97th-minute penalty.
articles.title: Barcelona grab win with late Lewandowski penalty

articles.description: A Bundesliga 2 match between Hansa Rostock and Hamburg is halted by remote control cars with smoke bombs entering the pitch.
articles.title: Remote control cars with smoke bombs halt match

articles.description: World number one Iga Swiatek claims the Qatar Open title for the third year in a row with victory over Elena Rybakina.
articles.title: Qatar Open: Iga Swiatek beats Elena Rybakina to win title for third year in a row
